title: wtf
description: One Plan, Two Parties, Six Players:Jimmy: the driverCam: the connectByron: the know-it-allReina: the conscienceMC: the crasherOn one Friday night these six will test their limits to the extreme. Some are driven by lust, others by greed. One just wants to have fun, and another desires to be free. If everything goes as planned, they will all get what they want. But within twenty-four hours, bones will break, bodies will touch, hearts will race, guns will be drawn, and everything will go oh so very wrong.
author: Peter Lerangis
